modName: Saadia Redguard Companion -Death in Erotic Form- Adult
summary: This is version 2.0 and she should be completely stable now. I am confident that my Saadia is one of the most beautiful Redguards you will find for download here on the Nexus. I have learned much since her initial release and have been working on this update for a little over two weeks. She will work with all known bodies now.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1342647862.jpg[/img][/center]
[B][COLOR= CORNFLOWERBLUE][size= 4]UPDATE: 07/29/12 I uploaded an experimental version of Saadia under miscellaneous files and am looking for feedback on her. I seem to be having issues with my game and cannot experience her using new spells or perks. Please comment and let me know how she works!

I have been made aware that Saadia is a bit on the weak side. I am working on that now and I am also going to offer a variant with different hair based on a request from one of my supporters, LavaHawaii. Please look for this update to be completed very very soon! 
Because this is a replacer she will be visually usable immediately but if you make her a follower or marry her before you finish her questline you may break her or damage your game![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] 

[b][color= red][size= 4]I strongly suggest that you complete Saadia\'s quest first before using the included bat files to marry her or make her your companion![/size][/COLOR][/B]  

[b][size= 2][color=cornflowerblue]
Required Files: Latest version of ApachiiSkyhair 
Race: Redguard
Voice: Female Sultry
Hair: Nearly black with a touch of brown
Eyes: Ice Blue
Weight: 70% at the scale. If you use ADEC, UNPB or CBBE bodies with BBP she should be perfect.
Height: 5\'9\" to 5\'11\"
Location: Whiterun, The Bannered Mare
Perks and Spells: Her perks are geared for one handed weapons and light armor use. Her spells are minimal; healing and stone flesh
Inventory: She is equipped with two steel daggers, and common pocket loot.[/b][/size][/color] [b][color= red][size= 3]She is nude without armor so you can outfit her with whatever you wish![/size][/COLOR][/B] 
[b][size= 2][color=cornflowerblue]Properties: She is available with heavy makeup or natural looking (light makeup) non-essential or essential and is marriageable.[/b][/size][/color]

[b]Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images 
I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and her No Shine (in some pics) on her.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812


Her body in my images is CBBEv3 main body with Navetseas CBBE 1.8 body \"Muscle Map Vers. 2\"; and Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss textures (in some pics). (She can be used with whatever body you prefer) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437

She is wearing a mashup I created of Mak\'s Remodeled CBBE Armor and Calientes Vanilla Armor for CBBE. This was done by using the console to add the various armor pieces to her inventory. Type in console: help arms, pauldron, belt, bikini etc... (Again she will appear nude in your game!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273
Gatti 12 Jewelry Outfit for CBBEv3
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18452
Re-texture for Jewery Outfit 12 from Gatti by someone
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19581
17 Craftable Pantys for CBBEv3M by goTha
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16837
 Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361[/b]

[b][color= orange]Using the \"Optional\" Bat Files. The \"Follower\" and \"Spouse\" files will automatically be directed to your Skyrim Data folder via the NMM. To use open the console and simply click on Saadia\'s character so her number appears and then type in console \"bat follower\" and hit enter and then \"bat spouse\" and enter and you are done. She will either return to The Bannared Mare when you dismiss her or return to your home if you marry her.[/b][/color]


[b][size=2]Thanks as always for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/size][/b]
author: FalmerBane
